scripts.build:prod: pnpm cleanup && pnpm copy:assets && pnpm install:mvnw && run-script-os
scripts.copy:assets: pnpm copy:pom && pnpm copy:dashboard && pnpm copy:webapp
scripts.podman:build:
run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v podman) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "podman build --ulimit nofile=5000:5000 $(echo $(build-env serverlessLogicSandboxBaseImage.buildTags) | xargs printf -- "-t $(build-env serverlessLogicSandboxBaseImageEnv.registry)/$(build-env serverlessLogicSandboxBaseImageEnv.account)/$(build-env serverlessLogicSandboxBaseImageEnv.name):%s
" | xargs echo) --build-arg QUARKUS_PLATFORM_VERSION=$(build-env serverlessLogicSandboxBaseImage.quarkusVersion) -f Containerfile" --else "echo Podman not found, skipping image build."
